about_the_game:
Fantasy Maps Book

This Fantasy Maps-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Maps from mythology, fantasy and everything imaginary!

Time to explore out of this world

Contents

The Fantasy Maps Book unlocks the following images:

  • Map Fragment - 35x32 px

  • Scroll - 50x37 px

  • Map Icon - 62x62 px

  • Dry Lands - 80x80 px

  • Fishing Village - 86x116 px

  • Crescent Island - 100x140 px

  • Minimap - 105x97 px

  • Holographic - 110x100 px

  • Treasure Map - 120x111 px

  • Polar - 120x120 px

  • Compass - 140x100 px

  • Globe - 163x162 px

  • Hyperlanes - 170x120 px

  • Puzzle Level - 171x387 px

  • Spaceship Interior - 182x271 px

  • Continent - 200x170 px

  • Dungeon Crawler - 222x171 px

  • 1 Bit - 223x181 px

  • Roleplaying - 306x154 px

  • Flying Cruise - 320x142 px
